about_the_game:
January 1988, in a secluded place in the heart of Chic-Choc Mountains, Quebec.

An avalanche tears apart the luxurious ski lodge known as Spirits’ Creek. The place is isolated from the world, prisoner of a storm with seemingly no end in sight. Émile Arsenault, the owner-founder, attempts to find his daughter who vanished during the events – but the hotel is riddled with monstrous creatures and inexplicable events.
Do you have what it takes to fight through the night and save your daughter?

Spirits’ Creek is a third-person survival-horror experience crafted by students in 15 weeks at the Campus ADN, a public videogame school in downtown Montreal.
  • Explore a luxurious hotel filled with mysteries and unveil the Arsenault family’s secrets
  • Fight frightening creatures and a ruthless, blood-thirsty Beast
  • Discover new tools to increase your chances of surviving and explore the haunted dwelling

content_descriptors.notes:
- Blood and gore-free violence during fights
- Psychological horror elements
- Decor elements with blood stains
- Skeletons used as decor elements
- Depiction of cognitive disorder (main character)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game controller required. Wired or wireless Xbox first-party controller with rumble supported, as well as wired DualShock4 and DualSense controllers. Rumble and light bar supported on PlayStation controllers (only available when wired). Third-party wired controllers supported. Spirits' Creek renders at 1080P. If your monitor(s) render at a higher resolution and you experience some UI Scaling issues, please consider changing your screen's resolution for the duration of your playthrough.

short_description: Spirits’ Creek is a third-person horror adventure where, following an avalanche, you play as a father looking for his daughter. Battle supernatural creatures, tame the elements and solve the mystery surrounding the events in order to survive the night.
